Top-3 Scripts:
ul_11102: end=$(($(date +%s) + 45))
while true; do
  some_job &
  [ $(date +%s) -ge $end ] && break
  sleep 15
  wait
done
[ $(date +%s) -ge $(($end + 15)) ] || some_job

so_33053064: kill -- "$(cat mybot.pid)"
now="$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S)"
nohup node mybot.js >> "logi/logi_$now.txt" &
echo $! > mybot.pid
